job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <ul><li>Master's degree or PhD in Computer Science/Engineering, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Physics, or equivalent</li><li>4+ years’ professional experience in ML and computer vision</li><li>A knack for creativity and ability to formulate problems and solve them independently</li><li>Outstanding skills in Machine Learning especially techniques such as Deep Neural Networks, Random forest, Gradient boosting, Hyperparameter optimization techniques etc.</li><li>Proficient skills in development of AI/ML applications through state-of-the-art frameworks such as Keras, TensorFlow, and PyTorch</li><li>Knowledge in programming skills in various languages (e.g., Python, C++, or Java) with proficiency in Python</li><li>An interest to constantly learn, communicate, interact, share information, and willingness to help others</li></ul>
